message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of its worth. I would like to propose a lower price of $750,000 to reflect my assessment of its value.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $750,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we settle on $900,000? This represents a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $850,000 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise between our valuations.
